# gitea_oauth2_app (Resource)

Manages an OAuth2 application



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the OAuth2 application
- `redirect_uris` (List of String) List of redirect URIs

### Optional

- `confidential_client` (Boolean) Whether this is a confidential client

### Read-Only

- `client_id` (String) The client ID
- `client_secret` (String, Sensitive) The client secret
- `created` (String) Timestamp when the application was created
- `id` (Number) The ID of the OAuth2 application
